body_html: I ran into a similar issue but I could get a successfull SYCL-based build once switching back to ComputeCpp 0.4.0 (building against TensorFlow ~r1.4). So you might want to give that a try as well, if that is something possible for you.

body: I ran into a similar issue but I could get a successfull SYCL-based build once switching back to ComputeCpp 0.4.0 (building against TensorFlow ~r1.4). So you might want to give that a try as well, if that is something possible for you.
